name: Bolt Away
description:
Experience the world of scamming with your own eyes. Gather the data of your victims and sell it online to get useful upgrades. Are you a good enough scammer to not get caught by the police? 

Controls
  • Mobile
    • Press Left on-screen -> turn left
    • Press Right on-screen -> turn right
  • PC
    • A -> turn left
    • D -> turn right
Cheat Sheet

You get 1SC for every 100 points. Upgrades cost the current level*100.
